marketplaces.name: claude-code-kadoppe
marketplaces.description: kadoppe's digital twin - plugins that embody kadoppe's knowledge, workflows, and coding style

files.README.md:
# claude-code-kadoppe

kadoppeの分身 - kadoppeの知識、ワークフロー、コーディングスタイルを体現するClaude Codeプラグイン集

## Usage

### Add this marketplace

```bash
/plugin marketplace add kadoppe/claude-code-kadoppe
```

### Discover plugins

```bash
/plugin discover
```

### Install a plugin

```bash
/plugin install <plugin-name>@claude-code-kadoppe
```

## Available Plugins

Coming soon...

## Adding a new plugin

1. Create a new directory under `plugins/`
2. Add `.claude-plugin/plugin.json` manifest
3. Add components (commands, agents, skills, hooks, etc.)
4. Register the plugin in `.claude-plugin/marketplace.json`

plugins.name: kadoppe-constitution
plugins.description: Enforce software development constitution - kadoppe's principles and standards
